title: Punishments for dodge to low
body: For example i wasted 30 minutes of my time  just cause people are dodgeing games. Like i get  6 games in a row where someone dodges cause they dont have any points to lose or they get lower point losing if they dodge. this people should get banned not a slap and they do it over and over again. If a person is troll picking someone else leaves instead of reporthing that person...so trollers and leavers get away easy...why dont u implement a punish system designed to make them not do that anymore?

replies.body: Considering dodging games is actually an offical Riot advice for dealing with trolls, that really isn't gonna happen.

Not to mention everytime someone dodges you have and increased chance of being autofilled, even if you were in Q and had your role someone dodges and you immediately get back in Q youre then autofilled.

>If a person is troll picking someone else leaves instead of reporthing that person...so trollers and leavers get away easy...why dont u implement a punish system designed to make them not do that anymore?

I completely agree, but i cant imagine a system that fits this that cant be abused. It isnt the person dodging at fault entirely imo
